sub_topic: Moduli spaces of algebraic curves and their properties
message_1: Let X be the moduli space of smooth projective curves of genus 3. Calculate the dimension of X.
message_2:
To calculate the dimension of the moduli space X of smooth projective curves of genus 3, we can use the formula for the dimension of the moduli space of curves of genus g:

dim(X) = 3g - 3

In our case, the genus g is 3, so we can plug this value into the formula:

dim(X) = 3(3) - 3
dim(X) = 9 - 3
dim(X) = 6

Therefore, the dimension of the moduli space of smooth projective curves of genus 3 is 6.
